Sentencas: The propulsion system of an Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) plays an essential role in its performance, stability, and flight endurance.
Titulo: A comparative Analysis and Optimization of two Supersonic Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Turbine-less Jet Engine Propulsion Systems for Unmanned Aerial Vehicles

Sentencas: In this work, two types of propulsion systems for UAVs (differentiated based on the fuel type) are studied in order to determine their characteristics and advantages.
Titulo: A comparative Analysis and Optimization of two Supersonic Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Turbine-less Jet Engine Propulsion Systems for Unmanned Aerial Vehicles

Sentencas: These proposed propulsion systems use a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) to generate the heat required for the operation of the turbine and generate thrust.
Titulo: A comparative Analysis and Optimization of two Supersonic Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Turbine-less Jet Engine Propulsion Systems for Unmanned Aerial Vehicles

Sentencas: In order to achieve the best operating condition, a multi-objective Non-Dominated Sorting Genetic Algorithm (NSGA-II) in MATLAB is used to decide the key design parameters.
Titulo: A comparative Analysis and Optimization of two Supersonic Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Turbine-less Jet Engine Propulsion Systems for Unmanned Aerial Vehicles

Sentencas: To reach the best conditions where the acceptable thrust is accompanied by a reasonable flight duration, the TOPSIS decision-making method is considered.
Titulo: A comparative Analysis and Optimization of two Supersonic Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Turbine-less Jet Engine Propulsion Systems for Unmanned Aerial Vehicles

Sentencas: The results obtained indicate that the efficiency and generated power of the propulsion system increase with a higher flight altitude or compressor pressure ratio.
Titulo: A comparative Analysis and Optimization of two Supersonic Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Turbine-less Jet Engine Propulsion Systems for Unmanned Aerial Vehicles

Sentencas: Also due to the recirculation of fuel in the SOFC's anode, a higher efficiency is observed in comparison to when hydrogen is used since anode-recirculation causes a higher fuel utilization.
Titulo: A comparative Analysis and Optimization of two Supersonic Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Turbine-less Jet Engine Propulsion Systems for Unmanned Aerial Vehicles

Sentencas: The optimization result shows that the efficiency and fuel consumption for the hydrogen-fueled system is48.7% and 0.0024g/s, respectively, and 67.9% and 0.0066kg/s for a methane-fueled engine.
Titulo: A comparative Analysis and Optimization of two Supersonic Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Turbine-less Jet Engine Propulsion Systems for Unmanned Aerial Vehicles

Sentencas: It is also found that the maximum efficiency for both the hydrogen- and methane-fueled systems are available with the stack temperature of 1025 K; however the maximum thrust for these systems is at the stack temperature of 1075 K.
Titulo: A comparative Analysis and Optimization of two Supersonic Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Turbine-less Jet Engine Propulsion Systems for Unmanned Aerial Vehicles

Sentencas: In addition, increasing the fuel rate of the SOFC power unit helps the process of generating extra power and thrust for UAVs.
Titulo: A comparative Analysis and Optimization of two Supersonic Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell and Turbine-less Jet Engine Propulsion Systems for Unmanned Aerial Vehicles
